string.name: desc
string.value: A small figurine embedded with a gem that emanates heroism. This item allows you to activate and use the Heroic Statues in the Valley of Heroes.

string.name: desc
string.value: This map marks the hidden paths of Phantom Forest, which are now open to you.

string.name: desc
string.value: A magical stone that unlocks the gates to the Inner Sanctum of Crimsonwood Keep.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small candle from the Admin. This candle will turn itself off when the game is ended.

string.name: desc
string.value: A candle used on the birthday cake for the 4th anniversary of Maplestory. The flame will be blown out when the player exits the game and lit again upon returning to the game.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mr. Oh sells these rare spices at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell them to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can find these memorabilia from Thailand at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell them to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: Lena sells delicious unagi at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell it to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: This taxydermy shark, handmade by Tae Gong himself, can be found at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell it to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hanako sells this exquisite at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell it to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: A memory chip Agent W left with me. Information regarding 'Master M' is said to be contained in it. If I don't enter the secret code every hour, it will self-destruct.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small candle given by Cassandra. This candle will turn off automatically when the game ends.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Giant Star that Cassandra made for you. If you hold it during the Starlight Festival, you can receive 1 Star Stamp every hour. \n#cDisappears when you log out of the game.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Letter N that looks like it would fit perfectly on the Empty Compass.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Letter E that looks like it would fit perfectly on the Empty Compass.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Letter W that looks like it would fit perfectly on the Empty Compass.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Letter S that looks like it would fit perfectly on the Empty Compass.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Maple Leaf that signifies Maple Story's 6 year journey. Something good will happen if you hold onto it for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: An unknown being that has yet to be explained.

string.name: desc
string.value: A solid ice crystal that contains Maha Charm. Hold onto it for one hour and the crystal will melt, enabling you to acquire the Charm.

string.name: desc
string.value: A charm that contains protection from Maha, the spirit of Polearm. Take this to Cassandra for a chance to answer questions and receive prizes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Catch your breath and relax by sitting on this chair to recover 50 HP every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A specially-made sky-blue wooden chair that's only available in Lith Harbor. Recover 35 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A comfortable, plush green chair, complete with arm-rests. Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A comfortable, plush red chair, complete with arm-rests.. Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Catch your breath and relax by sitting on this chair to recover 50 HP every 10 seconds. Perfect for a quick break from training.

string.name: desc
string.value: Catch your breath and relax by sitting on this chair to recover 50 HP every 10 seconds. Perfect for a quick break from training.

string.name: desc
string.value: A comfortable, plush yellow chair, complete with arm-rests. Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: An adorable pink cushion that resembles a seal. Recovers HP 60 every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: An adorable blue cushion that resembles a seal. Recovers HP 60 every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Rumored to be crafted in Amoria, this special chair is also known as the Love Seat. Recover 20 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: An adorable white cushion that resembles a seal. Recovers HP 50 every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair crafted by Jacob. Recovers 75 HP every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A powerful chair used often on the battlefield. Recovers 60 HP every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair straight from the relaxation experts in Florina Beach. Recover 20 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A light, stylish chair that seems to be sent from the heavens. Recover 30 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair with magical properties crafted in Ellinia. Restores 35 MP per 10 Seconds while sitting.

string.name: desc
string.value: An adorable grey cushion that resembles a seal. Recovers HP 60 every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: An adorable gold cushion that resembles a seal. Recovers MP 60 every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A beach chair placed in the shades under the palm tree at Ariant. Sit on it to recover HP 40 and MP 20 every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A specially-made chair that's only available in Mushroom Shrine. Recover 60 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Enjoy a bath and relax in this spacious wooden tub to recover 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A white chair commemorating the 4th anniversary of MapleStory. Sit on it to recover HP 35 and MP 10 every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit in Beach Chair, 20 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A maple tree with a hanging swing. You can recover 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit in this chair, 50 HP are recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: An adorable black cushion that resembles a seal. Recovers HP 50 every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair hand-crafted by Stirgeman for aspiring superheroes! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair crafted within the Phantom Forest, complete with...ornaments...from unlucky travelers. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit on the Halloween Broomstick Chair, 50 MP is restored every 10 seconds

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair with a big umbrella. Recovers 30 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair made out of Ice Queen's ice pieces. Sit on it to recover HP 40 and MP 30 per 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Inferno will comfort your body. Recovers 60 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Abyss will comfort your mind. Recovers 60 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Stay in this igloo made out of ice and snow to recover 40 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: 40 HP is restored every 10 seconds if you lean back on this cute Sand Bunny Cushion.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit on the Rabbit Sofa, 50 HP and 50 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Relax in this cozy teddy bear bed to recover 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Relax in this mochi ice cream chair to recover 30 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You will recover 50 HP every 10 seconds. You will experience the might of a conqueror after recovery.

string.name: desc
string.value: You will recover 50 HP every 10 seconds. Perhaps, as you recline, you will find the answer to many of life's questions.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair makes you feel like you're sitting in the lap of luxury. Also recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A white chair created to celebrate Maple Story's 5th Anniversary. Sit on it to restore 35 HP and 10 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that restores HP every 10 seconds when used. It's very strong since it was made from bamboo grown on Rien.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pretty cushion shaped like a moon. Recovers 60 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: 60 HP is restored every 10 seconds if you lean back on this cute Male Desert Rabbit Cushion.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pink beach chair that makes you want to go to the beach. Restores 60 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A luxurious velvet sofa dyed with a beautiful shade of navy. Restores 60 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A designer chair that glows with a passionate red. Restores 60 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit in the shade of a large lotus leaf! A cute doll hangs off the edge. Recovers 200 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Perch yourself on the hand of this powerful yellow robot to recover 50 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you rest on the Shinsoo, 50 HP and 50 MP are restored every 10 seconds

string.name: desc
string.value: The chair in which the chiefs of the Miwok tribe sat. If you sit in this chair, you can receive the strength of the Miwok ancestors and recover 65MP in 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cushion that resembles Pink Bean, the underling of the Black Mage. Leaning against the cushion and resting will recover 50 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: 50 HP is restored every 10 seconds if you lean back on this music box.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit in It's a Hoot! Chair, 50 HP and 50 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: There is a swing on the Persimmon Tree with ripe persimmons.

string.name: name
string.value: Red Spin Hat Moon Bunny Cushion

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on the cushion to see the adorable Moon Bunny dressed in Red Spin Hat dancing.

string.name: name
string.value: Blue Spin Hat Moon Bunny Cushion

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on the cushion to see the adorable Moon Bunny dressed in Blue Spin Hat dancing.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on the cushion to see the amazing Moon Bunny tightrope while holding the fan.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on the cushion to see the amazing Moon Bunny blow its heart out with the Korean woodwind instrument.

string.name: desc
string.value: An eerie looking chair that resembles Olivia. Recovers 40 HP and 35 MP every 10 seconds

string.name: desc
string.value: Hold onto the Broomstick so you don't fall off.

string.name: desc
string.value: Catch your breath and relax by sitting on this chair to recover HP+50/MP+30 every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Take a break by leaning on the Stone Golem Hand to recover 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Take a break by leaning on the Dragon Skull Chair to recover 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A strong wooden chair personally crafted by Gustav. Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A new chair to recline and relax in throughout the Thanksgiving holiday.\nRecovers 60 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cuddling with the Polar Bear for some cozy, comfy rest will recover 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A huge X-mas Gift Box big enough to fit a grownup. It has a message that reads, "I am here for you." Sitting in it will recover 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Snuggle up with Aran's loyal mount, Ryko, to recover 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this cracked dragon egg shell and relax to recover 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this baby dragon swing to recover 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this chair to feel the warmth from the furnace. You can recover 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Snuggle up in this cozy polar bear chair to recover 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Lean back on this imposing Tiger Skin Chair to restore 50 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this Soul Teddy chair to recover 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this Lord Pirate chair to recover 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Relax in this cozy teddy bear bed to recover 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A new chair that makes you feel like a Rock Star.\nRecovers 60 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Take a break by sitting on this floating chair to recover 50 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair shaped like a musical note. Recovers 100 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special chair shaped like Sheep. Recovers 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this Easter Egg Basket for a sweet thrill of happiness.\nRecovers 40 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds while resting.

string.name: desc
string.value: Feel and Enjoy the Flower!!\nRecovers 50 HP, MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic chair that people in Neo City ride. It recovers 40 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic chair that people in Neo City ride. It recovers 40 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that resembles Balrog, an ancient demon that is rumored to be found deep inside Sleepywood Dungeon. When you sit in this menacing chair, 60 HP and 60 MP will be restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that resembles Zakum, a monster that is worshipped by residents near the volcanic area. When you sit in this chair, you'll feel the power of Zakum. 80 HP and 50 MP will be restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that resembles Horntail, an evil three-headed dragon that lives in Leafre's Dragon Forest. When you sit on a Horntail Chair, your injuries will heal quicker. 100 HP and 40 MP will be restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that symbolizes the authority of a chief. You can recover 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair with the romantic scent of roses. You can recover 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair with an adorable yet lazy panda chewing a bamboo stick. You can recover 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair with a fuzzy kitty rubbing its face on its body. You can recover 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that provides you the full wilderness experience. You can recover 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A white chair made to commemorate the beginning of MapleStory. You can recover 35 HP and 10 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: 60 HP and 60 MP are restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special chair shaped like the Dragon Lord. Recovers 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Moment of elegance. Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Need some privacy? Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Time to heal your wound. Recovers 100 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: 30 HP and 30 MP are restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you sit in the crystal chair made to commemorate the creation of Maple Story, 50 HP and 30 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: Cat lying in front of a Fan

string.name: desc
string.value: Restores 10 HP and 10 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: 50 HP and 50 MP are restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that will allow you to enjoy camping even more. It recovers 40 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mechanical chair that recovers HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special chair shaped like Owl. Recovers 30 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair made by modifying the machine the Visitor Representative used to ride. Sit on it and 50 HP and MP will be restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mechanical chair that recovers HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: This chair is shaped like the MWLB mascot. MWLB members can use this chair to regain 20 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit on Suri Chair, 50 HP and 30 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit on Full Moon Chair, 35 HP and 10 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit on Full Moon Chair, 35 HP and 10 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: There is a swing on the Persimmon Tree with ripe persimmons.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit on Yun Chair, 150 HP and 100 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: 30 HP and 30 MP are restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Friends are always valuable. Recovers 40 HP and 40 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A lovely kitten makes you happy. Recover 40 HP and 40 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Winter is coming. Recovers 30 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hug me tightly. Recovers 30 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sitting this chair, you can count how many stars are in the sky. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can predict your future with this chair. Recover 40 HP and 40 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A scary witch follows you for trick or treat! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can be artistic with this chair. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Settle down to some serious gaming with this great chair! Recovers 40 HP and 40 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: 50 HP and 50 MP are restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you sit in Pink Bean Pollen Pot Chair, 100 HP and 100 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bunny chair that recovers HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hug me tightly. Recovers 30 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Love chair that recovers HP/MP every 10 seconds. You need to sit facing your spouse to complete the heart.

string.name: desc
string.value: A campfire used for warmth and protection when camping outside.\n#cRecovers 60 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Stay in this igloo made out of ice and snow to recover 40 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair created to celebrate the Legends Awards. Recovers 35 HP and 10 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pink beach chair that reminds you of sand and surf. Recovers 60 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: An antique phonograph chair. Doesn't actually play music, but reminds you of it. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small chair with an attached easel for letting your creativity flow. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Everyone can use a friend! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Let the butler kitty pour you some tea! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair designed for the ruler of the Elves. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair for Aran who guarded the past.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair for Evan who guarded the past.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that contains the evil spirit of Coco from the Silent Crusade. Recovers 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that contains a tamed evil power. 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Restores 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A heaping helping of mochi ice cream for you to relax in. Recovers 30 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds while resting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cuddly Pink Bean you can sit on. It's totally safe! Recovers 60 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Relax in this cozy teddy bear bed to recover 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Stay in this igloo made out of ice and snow to recover 40 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: 30 HP and 30 MP are restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Snuggle up in this cozy polar bear chair to recover 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this chair to feel the warmth from the furnace. You can recover 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bunny chair that recovers HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that resembles Zakum, a monster that is worshipped by residents near the volcanic area. When you sit in this chair, you'll feel the power of Zakum. 80 HP and 50 MP will be restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that resembles Horntail, an evil three-headed dragon that lives in Leafre's Dragon Forest. When you sit on a Horntail Chair, your injuries will heal quicker. 100 HP and 40 MP will be restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: The chair in which the chiefs of the Miwok tribe sat. If you sit in this chair, you can receive the strength of the Miwok ancestors and recover 65MP in 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hug me tightly. Recovers 30 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Need some privacy? Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: 50 HP is restored every 10 seconds if you lean back on this music box.

string.name: desc
string.value: 50 HP and 50 MP are restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: 60 HP and 60 MP are restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Lean back on this imposing Tiger Skin Chair to restore 50 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: There is a swing on the Persimmon Tree with ripe persimmons.

string.name: desc
string.value: A new chair that makes you feel like a Rock Star.\nRecovers 60 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Perch yourself on the hand of this powerful yellow robot to recover 50 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this cracked dragon egg shell and relax to recover 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this baby dragon swing to recover 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit on Full Moon Chair, 35 HP and 10 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: An adorable black cushion that resembles a seal. Recovers HP 50 every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you sit in the crystal chair made to commemorate the creation of Maple Story, 50 HP and 30 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit in this chair, 50 HP are recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair to commemorate Homecoming. Recovers 35 HP and 10 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pumpkin-shaped chair made to celebrate Halloween. Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Careful! Don't wiggle too much or the stork'll drop you! Restores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ride the carpet to fly. Restores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A comfy chair shaped like a pumpkin. Recovers 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Recovers 100 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mayday, mayday! Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: The royal harp of the Elves, famous for its sublime timbre. Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Restores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Story time with grandma is always so relaxing, but watch out...impostors could show up at any moment! Restores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds. #cCaution: Users may experience extreme old people smell.#

string.name: desc
string.value: An imposing throne fit for a master of darkness. Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: The tastiest, mintiest throne in all of Maple World. Restores 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair JUST fancy enough for the greatest thief of all time. Recovers HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Snuggle up in this cozy polar bear chair to recover 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Restores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cuddly Pink Bean you can sit on. It's totally safe! Recovers 60 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Restores 70 HP and 40 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that resembles Pink Zakum, a monster that is worshipped by residents near the volcanic area. When you sit in this chair, you'll feel the power of Pink Zakum. 80 HP and 50 MP will be restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on the cushion to see a cute Moon Bunny with a red hat do its thing!

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on the cushion to see a cute Moon Bunny with a blue hat do its thing!

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on the cushion to see a Moon Bunny doing a fan dance!

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on the cushion to see a Moon Bunny playing a trumpet with all its soul!

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that embodies the huge popularity of Cygnus. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Relax in this cozy teddy bear bed to recover 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Grandma sure does have a lot of crazy stories, but that cat smell is kind of overpowering. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Old guys tell the best stories. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Turns every day into Valentine's Day. Recovers 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds. Sit face-to-face with someone you love to complete a heart shape!

string.name: desc
string.value: Have some sweet teatime with Madeleine the maid. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Galacto-Drill Chair is surprisingly comfortable, despite the fact that it was made for alien bottoms. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit in It's a Hoot! Chair, 50 HP and 50 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Careful! Don't wiggle too much or the stork'll drop you! Restores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Given to the lightest of all knights. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Have some sweet teatime with Prince Sharyl. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ancient rock chair from the 2012 Artifact Hunt. Doesn't look very comfortable, but it looks beautiful! Recovers 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this and you'll feel like you're getting a bear hug from a polar bear! Recovers 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this and you'll feel like you're one of Lord Pirate's hostages! Recovers 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Radiant maple leaf chair made from jewels. Recovers 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: White chair made to celebrate 8th anniversary. Recovers 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair given to those with Jett's sense of adventure. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A luxurious toilet chair. It has everything you'll need! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this and enjoy the respite of the quiet starry night! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Power Elixir chair emitting mysterious light. Let's you recover HP & MP slightly faster than from other potion chairs. Restores 110 HP and 60 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red potion chair that makes you feel like you'll recover HP slightly faster than from other chairs. Recovers 110 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A blue potion chair that makes you feel like you'll recover MP slightly faster than from other chairs. Recovers 100 HP and 60 MP every 10 seconds.

string.value: 메이플 수호자 깃발 의자(5년 이상~7년 미만)_시그너스

string.name: desc
string.value: 메이플스토리를 오랫동안 응원하고 수호한 영웅을 위한 상징의 깃발 의자다. Recovers 100 HP, 80 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A throne fit for the world's greatest kings... which means it's JUST good enough for a BigWig.\nRecovers 100 HP, 100 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: How does a Demon Slayer celebrate a birthday? Do they even have them? 100 HP and 50 MP restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Enjoy a special performance by the one and only Mercedes! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this chair to become more beautiful with Hilla! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this drill machine chair to recover 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this Mini Shinsoo chair to recover 50 HP and MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Restores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seceonds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A tiny chair for Haruaki's fox. \n#cRestores 60 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Commanding warriors love to dole out orders from atop this chair. \n#cRestores 60 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Everybody's a billionaire in this chair! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Anyone who isn't us is our enemy. Recovery 200 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: They're seriously fun guys! They are also fungi. That was the joke. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Positively pimpin'. Recovery 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A good king knows when to save his strength and when to destroy his enemies. Recovery 100 HP and 200 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a little on the hot side, but at least it comes with a wicked red dragon! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a little on the cold side, but at least it comes with a wicked blue dragon! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Let's fool around with a cat next to a fan. Because, why not? Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You'll feel like you own a tiny island! Only you won't. You'll own a chair. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Smells a whole lot like sweat and cotton candy... MAGIC! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Filled with refreshing fruit, guaranteed to soak your bottom! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You're going to get a little wet and you'll probably be covered in fur. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cool people always wear black. ALWAYS. Even at night on their bicycles. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You just feel so much smarter than everybody else. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A lovely chair for lovely couples. Lonely people may also sit in it, but it won't be fun. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Is it just me, or is it sleepy in here? Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: It said it would return the day after tomorrow with rice cakes. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair with an overwhelming stare. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gives lousy hugs, but you get what you pay for. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A truly devilish sheep. Napping not advised. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Girl gamers are real, and they’re made of marshmallows, and they smell like unicorns. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Just hoo’in around. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: The chair isn’t made of skin, but it sure is nice on yours! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Drowse among the baby birds without a worry. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Makes you feel clean. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: What’s better than recreating that time you broke your spine in half at band camp? Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: FINALLY, you can be Elize's best friend. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: It is the cracked egg that recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds, if your butt is in the right place.

string.name: desc
string.value: A swing that is moved by a baby dragon. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Challenge the limits of your nerves. You could get high-fived at any moment! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Things are going so well! Nothing could possibly go wrong! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hop into the egg basket with a chubby rabbit! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Oh my gosh, did you see how cute she was?!! I THINK SHE TOUCHED MY HAND! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You just feel so much smarter than everybody else. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A lovely chair for lovely couples. Lonely people may also sit in it, but it won't be fun. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cushy chair for discerning Republicans. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cushy chair for discerning Democrats. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hey, you're not the president! How'd you get in here?! Recovers 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Even Magnus gets lonely sometimes. Say anything, and Magnus will always answer. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Commanding warriors love to dole out orders from atop this chair. \n#cRestores 60 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Commanding warriors love to dole out orders from atop this chair. \n#cRestores 60 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Commanding warriors love to dole out orders from atop this chair. \n#cRestores 60 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Given to zombie menaces from the Halloween Masquerade. Recover 80 HP and 80 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A luxurious toilet chair. Don't forget to put the seat down! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair created to celebrate Halloween. Sit on it to recover 50 HP every 10 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: It said it would return the day after tomorrow with rice cakes. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Makes you feel clean. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: For when you need to swing a baby dragon, which obviously happens a lot. Recovers 40 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Baseball is finally fun with Orchid and Lotus on your team! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair created to celebrate Halloween. Sit on it to recover 50 HP every 10 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chair that gives you Von Bon's protection. Now you have nothing to be afraid of!

string.name: desc
string.value: It's less crimson than you'd expect.

string.name: desc
string.value: Chair that makes you feel like you are stuck in Vellum's cave.

string.name: desc
string.value: Now you know what the Miwok Boys have been going through. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fall deep into the calm of the jungle with the future of the Miwok Village. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: The Old and the Wise Chair

string.name: desc
string.value: Sitting next to the elder is always a little awkward. Sit and recover 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: No wonder King Pepe always looks so smug and superior. This thing could knock over a house! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's hard to say why King Pepe has allowed himself to be a chair, but you don't second-guess comfort. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Like most expensive things, this chair is all hard angles and back pain, but your friends will be TOTALLY jealous. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a cute name, but seriously, find a mattress to hunker under until it passes. Those teeth are really sharp. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Just keep in mind that clouds are made of frozen water when you're trying to explain away that giant puddle on your rear end. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Truly, this must be heaven. Smelly, biting, slobbery heaven. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Purchases by rodents or rodent-lovers not recommended. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: So THAT's where chairs come from. Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Everybody on Southperry.net knows that a Mapler's best friend is a giant fluffy Chinchilla; mostly because it doubles a pillow between adventures.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cuddly Black Bean to sit on. It's totally safe, except for the radioactive, lead-based polyester filling. That stuff will kill you. Recovers 60 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Tot knows how to teach, and this chair keeps it going forever and ever and ever.\nIf you sit in Know-How Chair, 50 HP and 50 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Is this what it's like to sit in a cloud? Probably not, clouds are just frozen gatherings of gaseous moisture! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: What is a blank canvas, but an invitation to dazzle?\nIf you sit in Unpainted Masterpiece Chair, 10 HP and 10 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This painting could have gotten a little more love.\nIf you sit in Sort of a Painting Chair, 30 HP and 30 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Holy moly look at this work! The line weight, the brush work, the chiaroscuro lighting!\nIf you sit in Ultimate Masterpiece Chair, 50 HP and 50 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Oh my gosh, did you see how cute she was?!! I THINK SHE TOUCHED MY HAND! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A comfortable, stylish seat that only forms when true love exists between two people. Recovers 45 HP, 45 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A comfortable, stylish seat that only forms when true love exists between two people. Recovers 45 HP, 45 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit in Moon Chair in the early evenings while the Moon is up, 60 HP and 60 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you sit in chair that looks like a harvest god, 60 HP is recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sink yourself into this heavenly cake chair next to someone else who owns it as well, and watch it create a scrumptious effect! Mmm, this chair is so delicious you'll recover 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Yummy! Use this chair next to someone else who's also using it, and a mouth-watering chocolate fondue appears. Smack your lips and dream about treats as you recover 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A comfortable, stylish seat that only forms when true love exists between two people. Recovers 45 HP, 45 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit in Cherry Blossoms Chair, 30 HP and 30 MP are restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit in Fireworks Chair, 30 HP and 30 MP are restored every 10 seconds.
